unnormalised: Arre bhai, tumchea PAN card numberak tumcho Aadhaar 31/03 vorvim link korunk zai mhunn yaad dovortat! Ani, tumi dondo suru kortat zalear, tumchem GSTIN jevoddem xigr zata tevdhem xigr kortat; mhojem 27AXYZ1234A1Z5 asa.
normalised: Arre bhai, tumchea P-A-N card number-ak tumcho Aadhaar ektees march-chea adim link korunk visrunk naka! Ani, tumi ek business suru kortat zalear, tumcho G-S-T-I-N A-S-A-P soddun kaddat; mhozo sattavis A X-Y-Z ek don tin char A ek Z panch asa.
